seoDescription: Upload any portrait and turn it into a collectible-style 3D figurine render. Perfect for product mockups, fan art, and playful social posts.

hero.heading: Create 3D Figurine Photos with AI
hero.description: Use the figurine template to convert real portraits into miniature collectible renders. The AI rebuilds lighting, shading, and props so that every character looks like a premium designer toy.

steps.heading: How to Create 3D Figurines
steps.subheading: Turn your photos into 3D art in 3 simple steps.

items.title: Step 1: Upload
items.description: Upload a clear portrait or full-body photo.

items.title: Step 2: Generate
items.description: Our AI instantly renders your photo into a 3D figurine style.

items.title: Step 3: Download
items.description: Save your 3D art and share it with the world.

gallery.heading: 3D Figurine Showcase

items.title: Material-aware shading
items.description: AI recreates PVC, resin, or metallic finishes with physically accurate reflections.

items.title: Pose swap in one prompt
items.description: Describe a new attitude or accessory and the template rebuilds it instantly.

items.description: Switch between desk display, museum lighting, or toy shelf backgrounds without manual compositing.

items.title: Ready for marketing
items.description: Outputs square or portrait renders that fit marketplaces, launch decks, or merch drops.

valueProps.heading: Why creators love this template
valueProps.description: Design figurine-style assets in minutes instead of hiring a full 3D pipeline.

items.title: Friendly controls
items.description: Slider-based editor lets you dial glossy vs. matte, lighting warmth, and backdrop blur.

items.title: Consistent batches
items.description: Upload multiple references and keep proportions, outfits, and palettes aligned across a collection.

items.title: Hi-res output
items.description: Generates 4K+ renders suitable for posters, packaging, or crowdfunding assets.

moreEffects.heading: More creative AI image templates
moreEffects.description: Continue exploring stylized workflows and expand your asset library.

items.question: Do I need a 3D background to use this?
items.answer: No. Upload a clear portrait photo and the AI handles modeling, shading, and figurine materials automatically.

items.question: What kind of photos work best?
items.answer: Front-facing or 3/4 portraits with good lighting yield the most accurate figurine likeness. Avoid heavy filters or low resolution images.

items.question: Can I change outfits or props?
items.answer: Yes. Use prompt keywords such as “cyberpunk armor” or “holding a neon katana” to instantly restyle the figurine.

items.question: Is the output transparent?
items.answer: Exports include both background scenes and optional transparent PNG layers for quick compositing.

items.question: Is there a limit on renders?
items.answer: You can iterate freely within your credit balance. Saved templates help you reuse the same style for a full collection.

items.question: Can I commercialize the results?
items.answer: Yes. You own the renders you create, so feel free to use them for storefronts, campaigns, or merch proposals.
